meanings: somewhat, to some extent, in some measure, slightly

vlive.korean: 오늘 YouTube에서도 소개한 적이 있는 이 마스카라를 보여드릴 건데요. Today, I'm going to show you a mascara that I talked about in YouTube before. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 민가든 여행시 유용해! 여름 뷰티 파우치템 Summer travel pouch!

vlive.korean: 없잖아 이 조그만 비둘기 다니는 거 본 적이 없죠? "You haven't! You've never seen a small pigeon going around, right?" 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 바쁘신가요?🕺

vlive.korean: 이 질문 여러분들 앞에서는 한 번도 해본 적이 없는 것 같아요 안 보이시겠죠? I don't think I've ever talked about this in front of you. You can't see it, can you? 듣기 View video EXO : [FULL] 첸, 사월의 버스킹 (CHEN’s APRIL BUSKING)
vlive.english: I don't think I've ever talked about this in front of you. You can't see it, can you?

vlive.korean: 전 이 노래를 듣고 한 번도 신이 안 난 적이 없었어요. I've never not been excited listening this song. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : HuShin say something about musictalk
vlive.english: I've never not been excited listening this song.
